how-it-works-section.title: How it works
how-it-works-section.description: Help make your community better by reporting issues that need attention. Together we can create a safer and more pleasant environment for everyone.

step1.title: It all starts with you!
step1.description: You see something that needs attention, you report it. Your quick action is the first step to making your community better.

step2.title: Information on its way
step2.description: That sends a little bird our way with all the information you entered. Your report is now in our system.

step3.title: Smart routing in action
step3.description: Our smart routing system sends it to the right department and Kanton. We make sure the right people get notified.

step4.title: Work in progress
step4.description: They received your report and work on it. If they need more info, they will reach out to you directly.

step5.title: Ding, Ding! Update time
step5.description: You get an auto update when it's complete. Stay informed about the progress of your report.

step6.title: Voila, community improved!
step6.description: You've done a little more for your community. Thank you for making a difference!

processFlow.title: Community Impact
processFlow.description: With FIX, anyone can quickly report local infrastructure issues, ensuring the right authorities take action-whether it's a blocked pathway, a safety hazard, or a lost item. By bridging the gap between the public and local services, FIX helps keep Swiss communities cleaner, safer, and better connected.

AboutUsSection.title: About us
AboutUsSection.description: FIX began with a simple question: Who takes care of abandoned bikes?
AboutUsSection.description2: It all began with a lone bicycle in Zug. Day after day, it sat under a tree, enduring sun, rain, and snow. Four weeks went by unnoticed - until one day it simply vanished.
AboutUsSection.outro: Was it stolen? Did the owner search for it? Did the police even know it was there?

items.question: How do I report an incident?
items.answer: You can easily report an incident through our web application. Simply describe the issue, add a location, and optionally upload a photo.

items.question: How long does it take to process?
items.answer: Reports are typically processed within 24-48 hours. Urgent matters may be handled more quickly depending on their severity.

items.question: Is the service available in my area?
items.answer: Our service is currently available in Switzerland.

items.question: Will I receive a confirmation?
items.answer: Yes, you will receive a confirmation email once your report has been submitted successfully.

items.question: Can I view my incident report later?
items.answer: Yes, you can access your submitted reports through the link in the confirmation email.

items.question: I can't find a suitable category, what should I do?
items.answer: If you can't find an exact match, choose the category that best fits your situation. You can provide more details in the description field.

items.question: Do I need to fill in all fields?
items.answer: Only the incident type, location, and your data are required. Photos and description are optional but helpful for better understanding of the situation.

items.question: Can I edit my report after submission?
items.answer: Once submitted, reports cannot be edited. If you need to make changes, please contact our support team.

generalInfo.title: 2. General Information
generalInfo.content: The protection of your personal data is important to us. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with legal data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

dataCollection.title: 3. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
dataCollection.intro: We collect and process personal data when you:

activities.service: use our service to report problems
activities.contact: contact us via the contact form

dataTypes.intro: The collected data includes in particular
dataTypes.name: Name, first name
dataTypes.usage: Usage data (e.g. visited pages, click behavior)

purpose.title: 4. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.intro: The processing of your personal data is carried out for the following purposes:

items.services: Provision and improvement of our services
items.reporting: Reporting problems to the responsible cantons and companies
items.analysis: Analysis of user behavior to optimize our offering

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing with Third Parties
dataSharing.intro: Your personal data is only shared with third parties if this is legally permitted or you have consented. Possible recipients are:

recipients.serviceProviders: Service providers who support us in providing our services (e.g. hosting providers, various partners from different industries)
recipients.clients: Customers of FIX GmbH who process their reports, e.g. cantons and various companies
recipients.authorities: Authorities, if we are legally obligated to do so

internationalTransfer.title: 6. Data Transfer Abroad
internationalTransfer.content: Should we transfer personal data to service providers abroad, we ensure that an adequate level of data protection is guaranteed, e.g. through contractual agreements or other suitable guarantees.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve the user experience and analyze the use of our website. You can restrict or prevent the use of cookies in your browser settings.

storageDuration.title: 8. Storage Duration
storageDuration.content: We only store your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes or as required by legal retention periods.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to receive information about the personal data we store about you. You also have the right to correction, deletion or restriction of the processing of your data as well as the right to data portability. Please contact the above contact address for this purpose.

changes.title: 10. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to change this privacy policy at any time. The current version is always available on our website.
